options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Incoming damage -3% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Incoming damage -3% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 25% chance of up to 3 thunderbolts on random enemies in 800 px (Cooldown: 3 sec. Inflicts 100% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- 30% chance of Shocking thunderbolt-struck enemies for 3 sec.

options.explain:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects.
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects. (Cooldown: 10 sec. Inflicts 21% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec. (This Shock effect can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignores your Shock Tolerance.)

options.explain:
Attacks generate shock waves, decreasing enemies' Neutralize gauge -0.05.

Damage Value +208 for 30 sec. per shock wave
options.explainDetail:
Attacks generate shock waves, decreasing enemies' Neutralize gauge -0.05. (Cooldown: 1 sec. Inflicts 6% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Shock wave energy is charged every 0.1 sec. after cooldown. (Charged up to 9 times)
- Charging generates bigger shock waves with attacks, increasing Neutral Gauge reduction and shock wave damage +100% per charge.

Damage Value +208 for 30 sec. per shock wave (Max Stacks: 30)
- Additional Damage Value Buff stacks +1 per charge

options.explain:
When you're affected by 2 or more Abnormal statuses among Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn, causes 1 effect that's not on you to enemies for 7 sec. every 7 sec.

options.explainDetail:
When you're affected by 2 or more Abnormal statuses among Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn, causes 1 effect that's not on you to enemies for 7 sec. every 7 sec. (These Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn effects can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignore your Bleeding, Poison, Shock, and Burn Tolerances.)
